item.title: C Level 2 Test
item.description:
<div class="highlight"><pre tabindex="0" style="color:#f8f8f2;background-color:#272822;-moz-tab-size:4;-o-tab-size:4;tab-size:4;"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">题目</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">1</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">：</span>
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">设某棵树的度为</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">3</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">，其中度为</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">2</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">、</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">1</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">、</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">0</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">的结点个数分别为</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">3</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">、</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">4</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">、</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">15</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">。则该树中总结点数为</span>
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>A. <span style="color:#ae81ff">22</span>
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>B. <span style="color:#ae81ff">30</span>
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>C. <span style="color:#ae81ff">35</span>
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>D. <span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">不可能有这样的树</span>
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">分析：按照结点计算公式，树的总结点</span><span style="color:#f92672">=</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">树的边数</span><span style="color:#f92672">+</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">1</span><span style="color:#f92672">=</span>(<span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">度</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">1</span><span style="color:#f92672">*</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">个数</span><span style="color:#f92672">+</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">度</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">2</span><span style="color:#f92672">*</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">个数…</span>)<span style="color:#f92672">+</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">1</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">。所以该树总结点数应为</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">2</span><span style="color:#f92672">*</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">3</span><span style="color:#f92672">+</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">1</span><span style="color:#f92672">*</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">4</span><span style="color:#f92672">+</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">0</span><span style="color:#f92672">*</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">15</span><span style="color:#f92672">+</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">1</span><span style="color:#f92672">=</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">11</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">，然而由于数的总结点数</span><span style="color:#f92672">=</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">叶子结点数</span><span style="color:#f92672">+</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">11</span><span style="color:#f92672">-</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">15</span><span style="color:#f92672">=-</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">4</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">，很明显，这样的树不存在，故选</span>D<span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">。</span></span></span></code></pre></div>

item.title: 发布网站步骤
item.description:
<p>在此步骤中，你将发布你的网站，但不会 部署 它。</p>
<p>当你发布站点时，Hugo 在项目根目录的 public 目录中创建整个静态站点。这包括 HTML 文件以及图像、CSS 文件和 JavaScript 文件等资源。</p>
<p>当你发布网站时，你通常不希望包含 草稿、未来或过期的内容，命令很简单。
quote:</p>

item.title: 博客简介
item.description:
<p><blockquote class="twitter-tweet"><p lang="en" dir="ltr">Owl bet you&#39;ll lose this staring contest 🦉 <a href="https://t.co/eJh4f2zncC">pic.twitter.com/eJh4f2zncC</a></p>&mdash; San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance (@sandiegozoo) <a href="https://twitter.com/sandiegozoo/status/1453110110599868418?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">October 26, 2021</a></blockquote>
<script async src="https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js" charset="utf-8"></script>


博客（英语：Blog）是一种在线日记型式的个人网站，借由张帖子章、图片或视频来记录生活、抒发情感或分享信息。博客上的文章通常根据张贴时间，以倒序方式由新到旧排列。
quote:</p>
